data.text: @hayley_snailz @samstreetwrites Yes I went for a PCR at a mobile site and came back positive
@LionofGlencoe @CBLG7 @samstreetwrites You can’t get a recovery pass from a lateral flow
@CBLG7 @samstreetwrites Depends on if the nhs gave you a pcr or told you to stay home and use your lateral flow.  I was refused a pcr and now I can’t get one 😡
@samstreetwrites Amazing. Thank you for the info, much appreciated 🙏🏻
@OliveandAlice Just the UK recovery pass, no tests.

@samstreetwrites This is excellent news! It’s all going the right way 🤞🏻 So if unjabbed, do visitors need to do PCRs to go, or can they just use the recovery certificate? Thanks for coming back to me so quickly 🙏🏻
@samstreetwrites Do you know when they reopen to covid recovered? Is it with immediate effect?
@samstreetwrites I had it late December 22nd holiday early July  does that mean I miss it by few days Sam ?
